author: adrianc
msg: More work on the Mini-language <simple-method> element: moved convenience methods from MethodOperation.java to SimpleMethod.java - so all sub-elements can use them (not just operations elements), simplified some code.

msg: Generalise indent handling to any JIRA id; allow for 4 digit issue numbers
